summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 40th Avenue Southwest, from West Brandon Street to West Alaska Street; except the east side of said avenue, from West Dawson Street to West Alaska Street; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 12157 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
